Detailed Description

use this class to read and write data in base64.

Author:
Robert Fourer, Jun Ma, Kipp Martin
Version:
1.0, 03/14/2004
Since:
OS 1.0
Remarks:
it possible to save memory by eliminating the need for all the <el> tabs by writing a long string of numbers in b64 format
